title: Animate Dead

odifier Slashing damage. Heal that many hit points. Fly: Fly to a target position using your movement speed. Immune to poison Darkvision Animate Dead: Flying Ghoul Flock Level 6 Spell Slot Until Long Rest 3m Summon 3 Flying Ghouls instead of 1, need 3 corpses.

Animate Dead: Zombie

Until Long Rest3m

Create a zombie that specializes in melee combat.The target must be a medium or small corpse.

STR 16, DEX 6, CON 16, INT 3, WIS 6, CHA 5

Slam: Hit a target with your bare fists for 2d6+3 Bludgeon
